description:
Akagi Mako is a junior high school second year and http://anidb.net/ch89587 [Gaju]`s younger sister and dance partner. She was temporarily partnered with http://anidb.net/ch88092 [Tatara] after her brother Gaju decided to partner with http://anidb.net/ch88093 [Shizuku].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Akagi Mako
